DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to compare alfuzosin GITS once daily versus placebo in achieving a successful TWOC after AUR due to BPH, among Chinese males in Hong Kong, and in delaying or avoiding a TURP.
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Trial Comparing Alfuzosin GITS 10 mg Daily With Placebo for Trial Without Catheter in Acute Urinary Retention With Long Term Follow up
DOC.criteria: Aged 50 or above Admitted for AUR due to BPH with PVR of 500 ml or more Previous history of TURP Use of alpha blockers within recent 8 months Renal impairment (serum creatinine >140 umol/l) Poor premorbid state
